urls.title: Pledge | easyJet.com
urls.description: We love to fly you to the places you want to go. Although we hope that there won’ t be any further travel bans, if there are, we can help you to get your plans back on track. The country you are travelling to has imposed a travel ban on the country you are departing from. Or the country you are travelling to has imposed a travel ban on passengers of your nationality and there are no exemptions in place that would allow you to travel. Or you would be required to quarantine in a government mandated hotel
